PIXIE

Pixie (PIcture eXploration and Inference Engine) lets you view and explore your saved images by various indices. Itâ€™s perfect for visual creatives looking for a novel, intuitive visual method to browse/search for inspiration and reference. Visit my blog post about PIXIE.
